mapper.insert: INSERT INTO privacy_term (privacy_term_id, created_at, privacy_term_subject, privacy_term_name, privacy_term_content, privacy_term_expiration_date, privacy_term_effective_date, privacy_term_status) VALUES (#{privacyTermId}, NOW(), #{privacyTermSubject}, #{privacyTermName}, #{privacyTermContent}, #{privacyTermExpirationDate}, #{privacyTermEffectiveDate}, #{privacyTermStatus})
